title: Real Time Bill Maher 20080404 (Youtube) and Overtime (wmv)
description:
1.
**********
This torrent contains "Real Time with Bill Maher" from 2008.04.04 and its
"Overtime" internet-only addendum.




2.
**********
You can also download or stream the episode from:

  

Yes, its uploaded by HBO themselves, and the quality is actually
not so bad. Only available until 4/21/08/ on youtube. I used
a script call "youtube-dl" to download it, but there&#039;s also
pages like kipvid.com which does the same thing.



3.
**********
And you can stream "Overtime" from:

  <a href=" http://www.hbo.com/billmaher/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.hbo.com/billmaher/</a>

To get it to down to a file, I used the following command:
mplayer -dumpstream mms://hbo-1.wmod.llnwd.net/a2267/d1/u/webcon/billmaher/season6/b_maher_ot_4_4_wm_384.wmv



4.
**********
Sync issues.

Using mplayer, I had to add "-delay 0.15" because it was
a little bit out of sync. This is probably a problem with
the flv decoder mplayer is using.

"Overtime" seems to be fine.
